data.actual_result: The chat is split in large gaps, almost like in Cozy mode.

data.short_description: When using 150 font scaling in Compact mode, the spacing of messages is wrong, leaving gaps between the lines.
data.steps_to_repro: - User Settings, Appearance - set Compact Mode - set Chat Font Scaling to 150
